P

parallelAdditions(double[], double[], long[], String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.components.AsynchronousParallelCalculator
add each of the first operands with each of the second and return the results one by one, as soon as they become available, by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial numbers allow the caller to identify its each of the results when receiving them.
parallelAdditions(double[], double[], long[], String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.connections.AsynchronousParallelCalculatorServicesConnector

parallelAdditions(double[], double[], long[], String) - Method in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.interfaces.AsynchronousParallelCalculatorServicesCI
add each of the first operands with each of the second and return the results one by one, as soon as they become available, by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial numbers allow the caller to identify its each of the results when receiving them.
ParallelClient - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.components
The class ParallelClient implements a component that calls the parallel vector calculator component to show how it works.

parallelSubtractions(double[], double[], long[], String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.components.AsynchronousParallelCalculator
subtract each of the first operands with each of the second and return the results one by one, as soon as they become available, by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial numbers allow the caller to identify its each of the results when receiving them.

subtract each of the first operands with each of the second and return the results one by one, as soon as they become available, by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial numbers allow the caller to identify its each of the results when receiving them.
POOL_URI - Static variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asynpcalc.components.AsynchronousParallelCalculator
URI of the pool of threads used to perform the computations in parallel.
